mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_USER WHERE username = #{username}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_USER WHERE email = #{email}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_JOIN( USER_ID, ISSUE_DATE ) VALUES( #{id}, SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_USER SET IS_ACTIVE = 'Y', ENROLL_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT U.ID, U.USERNAME, U.PASSWORD, U.REALNAME, U.EMAIL, U.PHONE, U.SSN, U.ADDRESS_1 address1, U.ADDRESS_2 address2, U.IS_ACTIVE isActive, J.ISSUE_DATE issueDate FROM TB_JOIN J LEFT JOIN TB_USER U ON (U.ID = J.USER_ID) ORDER BY ISSUE_DATE ASC
SELECT USER_ID FROM TB_ACCESS_KEY WHERE ISSUE_DATE + 1/24/2 > SYSDATE AND ACCESS_KEY = #{accessKey}
